meanings.definition: relating to or in accordance with Jewish law
meanings.sent1: The halachic teachings guide our daily actions.
meanings.sent2: She follows the halachic traditions of her ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The halachic rules about keeping kosher can be challenging but meaningful.
meanings.sent4: His commitment to halachic practices is unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The rabbi's halachic advice was invaluable in resolving the dispute.

meanings.definition: a ruling or decision in Jewish law
meanings.sent1: The rabbi issued a halachic on the matter.
meanings.sent2: The halachic was debated among the scholars.
meanings.sent3: The halachic caused quite a stir in the community.
meanings.sent4: His interpretation of the halachic was innovative.
meanings.sent5: The halachic provided clarity on the religious practice.
